display_html: newtype ProvM t m a = ProvM (StateT (StrictMaybe t) m a)
name: ProvM ProvM

display_html: data PObject
name: PObject

display_html: type Provenance t = (Typeable t, ToJSON t, Show t, NoThunks t)
name: Provenance

display_html: type Prov m a = ProvM Store m a
name: Prov

display_html: data BlackBox t
name: BlackBox

display_html: lift ∷ (MonadTrans t, Monad m) ⇒ m a → t m a
name: lift

name: putM

name: getM

name: modifyM

name: modifyWithBlackBox

display_html: runProv ∷ Monad m ⇒ Prov m t → m t
name: runProv

display_html: runWithProv ∷ Monad m ⇒ Prov m t → m (t, Store)
name: runWithProv

display_html: runOtherProv ∷ Monad m ⇒ s1 → ProvM s1 m a → ProvM s2 m (a, BlackBox s1)
name: runOtherProv

display_html: liftProv ∷ Monad m ⇒ ProvM s1 m a → s1 → (a → s1 → s2 → s2) → ProvM s2 m a
name: liftProv

display_html: dump ∷ Monad m ⇒ Prov m String
name: dump

display_html: store ∷ ∀ t m. (Provenance t, Monad m) ⇒ Text → m t → Prov m t
name: store

display_html: push ∷ (Provenance t, Monad m) ⇒ Text → t → Prov m ()
name: push

display_html: pull ∷ ∀ t m. (Monad m, Typeable t) ⇒ Text → Prov m (BlackBox t)
name: pull

display_html: update ∷ ∀ t m. (Provenance t, Monad m) ⇒ Text → (t → t) → Prov m ()
name: update

display_html: updateWithBlackBox ∷ ∀ t m s. (Provenance t, Monad m) ⇒ Text → BlackBox s → (s → t → t) → Prov m ()
name: updateWithBlackBox

display_html: pushOtherProv ∷ (Provenance s1, Monad m) ⇒ Text → s1 → ProvM s1 m a → ProvM Store m a
name: pushOtherProv

display_html: runWithProvM ∷ Monad m ⇒ s → ProvM s m a → m (a, s)
name: runWithProvM

display_html: runProvM ∷ Monad m ⇒ ProvM s m b → m b
name: runProvM

display_html: find ∷ ∀ t k. (Ord k, Typeable t) ⇒ k → Map k PObject → StrictMaybe t
name: find

display_html: observe ∷ Store → String
name: observe

display_html: preservesNothing ∷ Monad m ⇒ ProvM t m a → m Bool
name: preservesNothing

display_html:
data RuleType
  • = Initial
  • | Transition
name: RuleType Transition Initial

display_html: class RuleTypeRep t
name: RuleTypeRep

display_html: type family RuleContext (t ∷ RuleType) = (ctx ∷ Type → Type) | ctx → t where ...
name: RuleContext

display_html: newtype IRC sts = IRC (Environment sts)
name: IRC IRC

display_html: newtype TRC sts = TRC (Environment sts, State sts, Signal sts)
name: TRC TRC

display_html: type Rule sts rtype = F (Clause sts rtype)
name: Rule

display_html: type TransitionRule sts = Rule sts 'Transition (State sts)
name: TransitionRule

display_html: type InitialRule sts = Rule sts 'Initial (State sts)
name: InitialRule

display_html:
data Assertion sts
  • = PreCondition String (TRC sts → Bool)
  • | PostCondition String (TRC sts → State sts → Bool)
name: Assertion PreCondition PostCondition

display_html:
data AssertionViolation sts = AssertionViolation {
  • avSTS ∷ String
  • avMsg ∷ String
  • avCtx ∷ TRC sts
  • avState ∷ Maybe (State sts)
}
name: AssertionViolation AssertionViolation avSTS avMsg avCtx avState

display_html:
data AssertionException where
  • AssertionException ∷ ∀ sts. STS sts ⇒ AssertionViolation sts → AssertionException
name: AssertionException AssertionException

display_html:
class (Eq (PredicateFailure a), Show (PredicateFailure a), Monad (BaseM a), Typeable a) ⇒ STS a where
  • type State a ∷ Type
  • type Signal a ∷ Type
  • type Environment a ∷ Type
  • type BaseM a ∷ Type → Type
  • type Event a ∷ Type
  • type PredicateFailure a ∷ Type
  • initialRules ∷ [InitialRule a]
  • transitionRules ∷ [TransitionRule a]
  • assertions ∷ [Assertion a]
  • renderAssertionViolation ∷ AssertionViolation a → String
name: STS State Signal Event Environment PredicateFailure BaseM renderAssertionViolation initialRules transitionRules assertions

display_html: data STUB (e ∷ Type) (st ∷ Type) (si ∷ Type) (f ∷ Type) (m ∷ Type → Type)
name: STUB

display_html:
class (STS sub, BaseM sub ~ BaseM super) ⇒ Embed sub super where
  • wrapFailed ∷ PredicateFailure sub → PredicateFailure super
  • wrapEvent ∷ Event sub → Event super
name: Embed wrapFailed wrapEvent

(?!:) ∷ Either e () → (e → PredicateFailure sts) → Rule sts ctx ()
validate ∷ Validation (NonEmpty (PredicateFailure sts)) () → Rule sts ctx ()

name: validateTransLabeled

name: Label

  • = EventPolicyReturn
  • | EventPolicyDiscard

name: labeledPredE

name: ifFailureFree

name: whenFailureFreeDefault

display_html:
data AssertionPolicy
  • = AssertionsAll
  • | AssertionsPre
  • | AssertionsPost
  • | AssertionsOff
name: AssertionPolicy AssertionsAll AssertionsPre AssertionsPost AssertionsOff

display_html:
data ValidationPolicy
  • = ValidateAll
  • | ValidateNone
  • | ValidateSuchThat ([Label] → Bool)
name: ValidationPolicy ValidateAll ValidateNone ValidateSuchThat

display_html:
data ApplySTSOpts ep = ApplySTSOpts {
  • asoAssertions ∷ AssertionPolicy
  • asoValidation ∷ ValidationPolicy
  • asoEvents ∷ SingEP ep
}
name: ApplySTSOpts ApplySTSOpts asoAssertions asoValidation asoEvents

display_html:
data STSResult s = STSResult {
  • stsResultState ∷ State s
  • stsResultFailures ∷ [PredicateFailure s]
  • stsResultEvents ∷ [Event s]
}
name: STSResult STSResult stsResultState stsResultFailures stsResultEvents

display_html: applySTSOpts ∷ ∀ s m rtype ep. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ ApplySTSOpts ep → RuleContext rtype s → m (EventReturnType ep s (State s, [PredicateFailure s]))
name: applySTSOpts

display_html: applySTSOptsResult ∷ ∀ s m rtype ep. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ ApplySTSOpts ep → RuleContext rtype s → m (STSResult s)
name: applySTSOptsResult

display_html: applySTSOptsEither ∷ ∀ s m rtype ep. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ ApplySTSOpts ep → RuleContext rtype s → m (Either (NonEmpty (PredicateFailure s)) (EventReturnType ep s (State s)))
name: applySTSOptsEither

display_html: applySTS ∷ ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → m (Either (NonEmpty (PredicateFailure s)) (State s))
name: applySTS

display_html: applySTSIndifferently ∷ ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → m (State s, [PredicateFailure s])
name: applySTSIndifferently

display_html: reapplySTS ∷ ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → m (State s)
name: reapplySTS

name: globalAssertionPolicy

display_html: applySTSInternal ∷ ∀ s m rtype ep. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ SingEP ep → AssertionPolicy → RuleInterpreter ep → RuleContext rtype s → ExceptT (AssertionViolation s) m (EventReturnType ep s (State s, [PredicateFailure s]))
name: applySTSInternal

display_html: applyRuleInternal ∷ ∀ (ep ∷ EventPolicy) s m rtype result. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ IsFailing → SingEP ep → ValidationPolicy → (IsFailing → STSInterpreter ep) → RuleContext rtype s → Rule s rtype result → m (EventReturnType ep s (result, [PredicateFailure s]))
name: applyRuleInternal

display_html: type RuleInterpreter ep = ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → Rule s rtype (State s) → m (EventReturnType ep s (State s, [PredicateFailure s]))
name: RuleInterpreter

display_html: type STSInterpreter ep = ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → m (EventReturnType ep s (State s, [PredicateFailure s]))
name: STSInterpreter

name: runRule

name: Threshold Threshold

name: sfor_

class (Eq (PredicateFailure a), Show (PredicateFailure a), Monad (BaseM a), Typeable a) ⇒ STS a where

  • type BaseM a ∷ Type → Type
